song.title: U-Men
song.info: Like most of my compositions, the samples and the sensations they inspire me are the basis of my creativity. I use a lot the chance and the improvisation to get something. I play with sounds and random notes. From these structures improvised my ideas take shape. Here I wanted the intro gives the impression of an operating factory. It is a metaphor for the incessant work of mankind throughout times. Whaouw ! Comments are welcomed.
